name: resourcequotastatus-v1
description: Role is a namespaced, logical grouping of PolicyRules that can be referenced as a unit by a RoleBinding.

hard.description: Hard is the set of enforced hard limits for each named resource. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/design/admission_control_resource_quota.md#admissioncontrol-plugin-resourcequota

used.description: Used is the current observed total usage of the resource in the namespace.
